GSD.description:
net_sched: cls_route: remove from list when handle is 0

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.291 by commit d0cce31f328fa10e7256f314e6e044e13cdf6814. For more details please see the references link.
